[
    {
        "title": "CONTRACT AMOUNT TO BE PAID TO PRIME (excluding MWBE Participation)",
        "content": "The contractor is required to disclose the contract amount to be paid to the prime contractor, excluding MWBE participation."
    },
    {
        "title": "MWBE PARTICIPATION AMOUNT",
        "content": "The contractor must disclose the MWBE participation amount."
    },
    {
        "title": "TOTAL BID/PROPOSAL AMOUNT",
        "content": "The total bid/proposal amount should be calculated by adding the contract amount to be paid to the prime contractor and the MWBE participation amount."
    },
    {
        "title": "TOTAL % MWBE PARTICIPATION AMOUNT",
        "content": "The percentage of MWBE participation amount should be calculated and disclosed."
    },
    {
        "title": "Conflict of Interest Questionnaire",
        "content": "The contractor must complete a conflict of interest questionnaire to ensure compliance with ethical standards and transparency in the proposal process."
    }
]
